title: Government permits 2,000 tonnes non-basmati white rice exports to Malawi, Zimbabwe
description:
Government permits 2,000 tonnes non-basmati white rice exports to Malawi, Zimbabwe

PTI Written By

The export is permitted through National Cooperative Exports Limited (NCEL), the Directorate General of Foreign Trade (DGFT) has said in a notification.

India has earlier also allowed such exports to...

title: What challenges await Malawi's next president?
description:
Peter Mutharika (Pic credit: AP)

Poverty on the rise



Citizens want decisive policies

Malawians call for change





Peter Mutharika has staged a political comeback, ousting incumbent President Lazarus Chakwera in a decisive election victory in Malawi. Unlike Chakwera, Mutharika's campaign drew ...
